import { AfterViewInit, Component ,ElementRef,ViewChild} from '@angular/core'; import { fromEvent } from 'rxjs'; import { DesignutilityService } from '../../../services/designutility.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fromevent', templateUrl: './fromevent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fromevent.component.css'] }) export class FromeventComponent implements AfterViewInit { constructor(private service:DesignutilityService){ } @ViewChild("addbtn") addbtn!:ElementRef ngAfterViewInit(): void { let count=1 fromEvent(this.addbtn.nativeElement, 'click').subscribe(res=>{ let countval="Video "+count++ this.service.print(countval,'elcontainer2') this.service.print(countval,'elconatianer') }) } }
